quote: The quieter you become, the more you are able to hear.
author: Rumi

quote: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
author: Buddha

quote: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work at hand. The sun's rays do not burn until brought to a focus.
author: Alexander Graham Bell

quote: To conquer oneself is the primary and noblest of all victories.
author: Plato

quote: The mind is everything. What you think you become.
author: Buddha

quote: Within you, there is a stillness and a sanctuary to which you can retreat at any time and be yourself.
author: Hermann Hesse

quote: The ability to simplify means to eliminate the unnecessary so that the necessary may speak.
author: Hans Hofmann

quote: Do not dwell in the past, do not dream of the future, concentrate the mind on the present moment.
author: Buddha

quote: Your calm mind is the ultimate weapon against your challenges. So relax.
author: Bryant McGill

quote: The key to concentration is to know what you want to focus on.
author: Unknown

quote: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
author: William James

quote: Meditation brings wisdom; lack of meditation leaves ignorance. Know well what leads you forward and what holds you back, and choose the path that leads to wisdom.
author: Buddha

quote: To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The art of concentration is a process of forgetting what you don't want to remember about what you want to remember.
author: Unknown

quote: You should sit in meditation for twenty minutes every day — unless you’re too busy; then you should sit for an hour.
author: Zen Proverb

quote: Quiet the mind, and the soul will speak.
author: Ma Jaya Sati Bhagavati

quote: The power of concentration is the only key to success.
author: Unknown

quote: Learn to be quiet enough to hear the genuine within yourself so that you can hear it in others.
author: Marian Wright Edelman

quote: The mind that is still the whole universe surrenders.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Concentration is the secret of strength in making all attainment.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: When there is peace in your mind, there is peace in your world.
author: Unknown

quote: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
author: Tim Ferriss

quote: Don't let the noise of others' opinions drown out your own inner voice.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The ability to focus is the foundation of all higher-level thinking skills.
author: Unknown

quote: To have peace of mind, you must have peace with yourself.
author: Unknown

quote: The quieter you become, the more you can hear.
author: Rumi

quote: Peace of mind is not the absence of conflict from life, but the ability to cope with it.
author: Unknown

quote: The essence of concentration is letting go.
author: Unknown

quote: In the midst of movement and chaos, keep stillness inside of you.
author: Deepak Chopra

quote: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy not on fighting the old, but on building the new.
author: Socrates

quote: Peace is the result of retraining your mind to process life as it is, rather than as you think it should be.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: Concentration is the root of all the higher abilities in man.
author: Unknown

quote: Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The mind can go in a thousand directions, but on this beautiful path, I walk in peace. With each step, the wind blows. With each step, a flower blooms.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Concentrate on the present moment, which is the only moment you have.
author: Unknown

quote: Peace is not something you wish for; it's something you make, something you are, something you give away.
author: Robert Fulghum

quote: The ability to concentrate and to use your time well is everything if you want to succeed at anything or get anything done.
author: Lee Iacocca

quote: Learn to be silent. Let your quiet mind listen and absorb.
author: Pythagoras

quote: The more tranquil a man becomes, the greater is his success, his influence, his power for good. Calmness of mind is one of the beautiful jewels of wisdom.
author: James Allen

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven’t found it yet, keep looking. Don’t settle.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: Concentration is a fine tooth comb that separates the important from the unimportant.
author: Unknown

quote: Peace begins with a smile.
author: Mother Teresa

quote: The secret of happiness is not in doing what one likes, but in liking what one does.
author: James M. Barrie

quote: The power of finding beauty in the humblest things makes home happy and life lovely.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: Concentration is the soul of genius.
author: Unknown

quote: Let go of the thoughts that don’t make you strong.
author: Karen Salmansohn

quote: The best and most beautiful things in the world cannot be seen or even touched - they must be felt with the heart.
author: Helen Keller

quote: The key is not to prioritize what’s on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
author: Stephen Covey

quote: Peace is not the absence of trouble, but the presence of God.
author: Unknown

quote: Concentration is the ability to think about absolutely nothing when it is absolutely necessary.
author: Ray Knight

quote: Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions.
author: Dalai Lama

quote: The present moment is filled with joy and happiness. If you are attentive, you will see it.
author: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: The ability to concentrate for long periods of time is a sign of maturity.
author: Unknown

quote: Peace is a daily, a weekly, a monthly process, gradually changing opinions, slowly eroding old barriers, quietly building new structures.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: Concentrate your energy on what you can control.
author: Unknown

quote: The greatest wealth is to live content with little.
author: Plato

quote: The art of concentration is learning how to pay attention to one thing.
author: Unknown

quote: To enjoy good health, to bring true happiness to one's family, to bring peace to all, one must first discipline and control one's own mind. If a man can control his mind he can find the way to Enlightenment, and all wisdom and virtue will naturally come to him.
author: Buddha

quote: The mind is like water. When it’s turbulent, it’s difficult to see. When it’s calm, everything becomes clear.
author: Pranav Dhanwanade

quote: Concentration is the ability to think well about one thing without being interrupted by anything else.
author: Unknown
